## What's Changed

### New Features

- **Version Management**: Added a version management page supporting online Web UI upgrades for the [Aurora theme](https://github.com/eamonxg/luci-theme-aurora) and [configuration plugin](https://github.com/eamonxg/luci-app-aurora-config)
- **Floating Toolbar**: Added support for creating, editing, and deleting shortcut buttons
- **Custom Logo**: Added support for customizing the theme logo (including browser tab icon)
- **Internationalization**: Added complete i18n support for 14 languages (German, Spanish, French, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, and Simplified Chinese)

### Other Improvements

- Simplified color design tokens and added detailed descriptions for settings
- Adjusted the application order within the system menu
- For remaining changes, see the [full changelog](https://github.com/eamonxg/luci-app-aurora-config/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0)
